name: C Code Ltd T/A Getshop
description: Getshop is a universal and easy to use ecommerce platform which has all functions needed to start an online business or grow existing one.

jobs.title: Sales and Marketing Representative Ecommerce Adviser IT Field Direct Software E-commerce United Kingdom UK
jobs.description:
Become Getshop Advisor and make £2000+ a month*

WHY BECOME A GETSHOP ADVISOR? 
•	Flexibility - Choose where and when you want to work
•	Value – Earn £100 per sale and £5 continuous monthly affiliate earning per sale (UNCAPPED Commission). On average our Advisors are earning between £200-£400 per week, although many are earning much more.
•	Fast payments - Get paid within 7 days
•	Training – We will provide 1-day free training
•	Marketing materials – We will provide set of free marketing materials including personalized promo videos
 
TO GET STARTED YOU MUST: 
•	Be aged 18 years or over
•	Own a laptop 
•	Have basic IT skills
 
WHAT IS GETSHOP

Getshop is a universal and easy to use ecommerce platform which has all functions needed to start an online business or grow existing one.
 
HOW IT WORKS
 
•	Clients can subscribe for £13.99 per month and build website themselves or Clients can take our customisation package for £200 and let our team create their website 100% including capturing and uploading up to 10 product photos
•	We will provide you with 1-day training about our website builder as well as FAQ training covering potential queries Clients can ask
•	As Advisor your target is to get interest and send Clients to our sales team
•	When we sell the package you referred to us, your earning will be as follows:
•	You will be earning fixed amount of £100 per package (50% of the £200 package cost)         And
•	Continuous £5 from each subscription you bring (36% of the £13.99 subscription fee).
•	Potential earning: for example, if you bring 200 customers to Getshop you will earn fixed amount of £20 000 plus £1000 a month from subscription affiliate earning.
 
 
Click apply here to get started!

*based on number of sales reached
